_header: Of Ribaldry I rhyme and read of my roll
_description: Satire on the Retinues of the great — ten long alliterative monorhyming quatrains

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Of rybaudȝ y ryme ant rede o my rolleOf gedelynges gromes of
                    colyn ant of colle…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Herknekþ hideward horsmen a tidyng ich ou telleÞat
                    ȝe shulen hongen ant herbarewen in helle
